The worst game in the world!

The game has a lot of hackers, a toxic platform with a toxic community, a terrible ranking system that is often flawed and exploited. But I tell yah, when I get a kill my monkey brain goes 'ooh ooh ahh ahh' and I feel a little better in the dark deep abyss that is this game. 10/10 would recommend tho
